actions.recommendation: You are going through a lot in your personal life, try reduce caffeine and work with the counselling options available at ICAS to reduce anxiety
Uncontrolled high BP can cause heart attack, heart failure, stroke, aneurysms and kidney failure. Please work with you GP to find the right medication for you.
Elevated cholesterol: Avoid fried food and try to get your fat from good fats like avo, nuts and olives. Supplement with Omega 3 2-4 g daily
Increased waist circumference - Reduce your sugar and refined carb intake. Manage your stress hormones, try to slow down, do relaxation exercises and set boundaries.
